name: 梦幻偶像
content: 一丝丝温馨感觉透进心光
抽屉中找到珍贵的照片
I wanna dance with you all night
随意拍嘅照片有你签名
一千封倾心的信寄个不厌
难忘是那次美梦里跟你
抽屉中找到珍贵的照片
I wanna dance with you all night
I wanna dance with you tonight
完全无法压制心中欢喜
I wanna dance with you all night
I wanna dance with you all night
I wanna dance with you all night
I wanna dance with you all night
